title: Winnebago Industries Bullish Moving Average Crossover Alert (WGO)
content:
Written on Wed, 09/02/2015 - 10:43am 
 
By Shiri Gupta 
 
Winnebago Industries ( NYSE:WGO ) shares have crossed bullishly above their 10-day moving average of $20.04 on a volume of 257K shares.  This may provide swing traders with an opportunity for a long position, as such a crossover often suggests higher prices in the near term. 

In the past 52 weeks, shares of Winnebago Industries have traded between a low of $18.82 and a high of $26.44 and are now at $20.28, which is 8% above that low price.  Over the past week, the 200-day moving average (MA) has gone down 0.2% while the 50-day MA has remained constant. 

SmarTrend is monitoring the recent change of momentum in Winnebago Industries. Please refer to our Company Overview for the results of our proprietary technical indicators that have been scanning shares of Winnebago Industries in search of a potential trend change. 
   
 Keywords:  moving crosses winnebago industries 
 
 Ticker(s):   WGO
